Name: Lusaka
Description: Lusaka is the capital and largest city of Zambia, serving as the country s political, economic, and cultural center.

Name: Kitwe
Description: Kitwe is a large city in the Copperbelt region of Zambia, known for its mining industry and as a major urban center in the region.

Name: Ndola
Description: Ndola is another city in Zambia s Copperbelt region, important for both mining and as a transportation hub.
